subject: Greetings
body:
Greetings
I write to inform you that I sent an email to you on different occasions but it bounced back.Please if you are still ALIVE, you should confirm to me immediately because I have important information to disclose to you that will be of benefit to you.
I await your early reply to this message.
Yours faithfully.
Rev. James Morrison

subject: Re:  Greetings
body:
Hello Rev. James Morrison,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm sorry to hear about the email issues, but I can assure you that I am very much alive and kicking! 

You've piqued my interest with your mention of important information that could benefit me. Could you please provide a bit more detail about what this might involve? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Christine

subject: Re: Dear Christine
body:
Dear Christine

This is to acknowledge your mail. And also happy that you are alive to
claim your fund.

Following the outbreak and spread of the Corona-virus(Covid-19) Pandemic
Globally.
This is to notify you that your-awaited COMPENSATION funds from the World
Bank Organization in conjunction with the Federal Reserve Bank of New York
in the tune of being A Scam victim or your family being badly affected with
covid-19 has finally been approved to be released to you.

It might interest you to know that we have taken out time in screening
through this project as stipulated in our protocol of operation and we have
finally confirmed that your payment is 100% genuine and hitch free from all
facets and of which you have the lawful right to claim your fund without
any further delay.

We also find out that scammer's have been deceiving beneficiaries  and even
extorted money from them in the process of helping them to receive their
funds. so you have to stop further dealing with anybody if you really want
to receive your funds.

Please If you are still INTERESTED to claim your fund do not hesitate to
Confirm YOUR FULL NAME(S):YOUR ADDRESS/ COUNTRY AND YOUR DIRECT MOBILE
PHONE upon the receipt of your information more directives will be given to
you on how to claim your fund through the Affiliated Bank via online
transfer with no cost. As we have set up to fight against scams and frauds,
activities are ravening World Wide. Please never forward this message to
anybody/person as we are seriously after all scammer's now.
I await your early reply to this message..
Yours faithfully.
Rev. James Morrison

subject: Re: Dear Christine
body:
Hello Rev. James Morrison,

Thank you for reaching out and I'm glad to hear about this opportunity. It's quite a surprise, but a welcome one indeed! 

I understand that there are people who might take advantage of situations like these, so I appreciate your efforts in ensuring the process is genuine and hitch-free.

Before we proceed, could you please provide more information about this project? What exactly does it entail? And how was I selected for this?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Christine

subject: Re: Dear Christine
body:
Dear Christine

This is to acknowledge your mail to me requesting to receive your long
awaited fund which has been in a suspense account pending with this bank.
CREDIT AGRICOLE NEXT BANK SA.

You will contact the bank  requesting for the release of your fund to be
made through the set down modality which the bank has accepted to use is
disbusing your fund.

Therefore, you are advised to contact the CREDIT AGRICOLE NEXT BANK SA on
the below address.

Please find below the bank details:
BANK NAME:  CREDIT AGRICOLE NEXT BANK SA

ADDRESS; Esplanade de Pont-Rouge 8-1
                  71212 GRAND-LANCY
                   Suisse-Switzerland
Attention to: Mrs. Christine Gandon ,(Director Foreign Remittance).
E-mail: info@agricolenext.com
E-mail: transferdept@agricolenext.com

You are going to contact the bank with the following information
A: Your Full Name..............
B. Your Address................
C. Your Country..................
D. Your working phone Number..............
E. Your working Email............................

Endeavor to contact CREDIT AGRICOLE NEXT BANK SA the moment you receive
this mail.You can proceed further and get back to me.
Yours faithfully.
Rev. James Morrison

subject: Re: Dear Christine
body:
Hello Rev. James Morrison,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. It's quite exciting to hear about this fund! I'm a bit confused though, could you please clarify what this fund is for? And how did it end up in a suspense account?

Also, before I contact CREDIT AGRICOLE NEXT BANK SA, could you provide me with more details about the process? What does "the set down modality" mean? 

I appreciate your help and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Christine

subject: Re: Dear Christine
body:
Hello Rev. James Morrison,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. It's quite interesting to hear about this fund in suspense with CREDIT AGRICOLE NEXT BANK SA.

Before I proceed, could you please provide me with more details? For instance, how did this fund come into existence and why has it been in a suspense account? Also, what is the set down modality that the bank has accepted to use for disbursing the fund?

I'm looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Christine

subject: Re: Dear Christine
body:
Dear Christine
I acknowledge you two messages to me requesting some clarification before
your proceed further.
Here below are your clarifications and more details your requested for.
A suspense account of a bank is where an amount that does not yet have an
owner or holder is kept pending when the rightful person comes.
For example, in this your case CREDIT AGRICOLE NEXT BANK SA.
B.The origin of the fund is the amount set aside by the international
governing body  to help citizens as part of emelorating the suffering of
its people in the world called excess from covid 19 proceeds.

C. The modalities to use depends on the bank effecting the transfer to you.
this exactly should not be your own business but the bank.
Therefore, you are advised to contact the CREDIT AGRICOLE NEXT BANK SA on
the below address.

Please find below the bank details:
BANK NAME:  CREDIT AGRICOLE NEXT BANK SA

ADDRESS; Esplanade de Pont-Rouge 8-1
                  71212 GRAND-LANCY
                   Suisse-Switzerland
Attention to: Mrs. Christine Gandon ,(Director Foreign Remittance).
E-mail: info@agricolenext.com
E-mail: transferdept@agricolenext.com

You are going to contact the bank with the following information
A. Your Full Name..............
B. Your Address................
C. Your Country..................
D. Your working phone Number..............
E. Your working Email............................

Endeavor to contact CREDIT AGRICOLE NEXT BANK SA the moment you receive
this mail.You can proceed further and get back to me.
Yours faithfully.
Rev. James Morrison

subject: Re: Dear Christine
body:
Hello Rev. James Morrison,

Thank you for your detailed explanation about the suspense account and the origin of the fund. It's quite interesting to learn about these things.

I'm a bit curious, how does CREDIT AGRICOLE NEXT BANK SA determine who the rightful person is for these funds? And what kind of criteria do they use?

Also, I'm wondering if there are any specific procedures or steps that I need to follow when contacting CREDIT AGRICOLE NEXT BANK SA? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Christine

subject: Re: Dear Christine
body:
Attention Christine.
I am very sorry for writing you back this late, the reason follows that I
was very busy with trips moving up and down with the forensic department
for an assignment.
Back to your mail and your interest to know very well before entering the
projects fully well. You sought for more clarifications and I am very happy
to give it to you as expected.
No no and no the bank are not the one that chooses those to benefit from
this funding, it is the government and the international bodies that
determines who gets paid for they only give instructions to the bank to
comply by disbursing the fund to the public.
The bank or Credit Agricole Next can not or does not determine the rightful
person for this fund.
Do you remember in my  reply explaining to you the suspense account issues
I told you that this fund came about from money meant to compensate the
public to reduce the hardship which was brought about after the covid 19
era.
The government of this country in conjunction with the international
community all over the world provided this funding for the public and they
uses a direct barlot criteria to pick, once you have a Registered company
then you are qualified to be picked and benefits from this package.
As far as I know there are no specific steps you need to take before you
contact the bank. What the bank does is just instructions to you to follow
and get your funds transferred directly by you.
Try to contact the bank and if there is anything you do not understand feel
free to ask me even before you answer the bank  back. I am here for you as
a friend.

Therefore, you are advised to contact the CREDIT AGRICOLE NEXT BANK SA on
the below address.

Please find below the bank details:
BANK NAME:  CREDIT AGRICOLE NEXT BANK SA

ADDRESS; Esplanade de Pont-Rouge 8-1
                  71212 GRAND-LANCY
                   Suisse-Switzerland
Attention to: Mrs. Christine Gandon ,(Director Foreign Remittance).
E-mail: info@agricolenext.com
E-mail: transferdept@agricolenext.com

You are going to contact the bank with the following information
A. Your Full Name..............
B. Your Address................
C. Your Country..................
D. Your working phone Number..............
E. Your working Email............................

Endeavor to contact CREDIT AGRICOLE NEXT BANK SA the moment you receive
this mail.You can proceed further and get back to me.
Yours faithfully.
Rev. James Morrison

subject: Re: Dear Christine
body:
Hello Rev. James Morrison,

Thank you for your detailed response and for taking the time to explain everything so thoroughly. I appreciate your patience with me as I try to understand this process better.

I'm intrigued by the idea of this fund being a form of compensation for the public after the hardships of the Covid era. It's a noble initiative indeed! 

You mentioned that there are no specific steps before contacting the bank, but could you perhaps elaborate on what kind of information they might ask for? I just want to be prepared when I reach out to them.

Also, you mentioned something about a 'direct barlot criteria'. Could you please explain what that means? Is it some sort of selection process?

Lastly, is there any particular person at CREDIT AGRICOLE NEXT BANK SA that I should address my inquiries to?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Christine

subject: Re: Dear Christine
body:
Dear Christine

I am more than trip and happy relating with you, mind if I can ask you some
personal questions  while I explain further to you.
A. Personal question....
Tell me a bit more about yourself like your Age, if married and if married
how many kids, where you work and your position in the establishment then
your phone number.
B. Back to Business....
Listen to me now, I want you to contact the bank today and right now and
whatever instructions they have for you, because they will inform you and
we go from there  but still let me clear your mind once again.
 To the best of my knowledge once you contact the bank you follow their
instructions on trying to register your payment and they will verify your
case and then after that you receive your payment immediately.
Yes you are very right the method used by the international community
/Government is direct barlot system and people are picked Randomly in a
mediation center after which they forward the list selected to the bank for
disbursements. The method used  is commonly called the selection process.

You just direct your letter to Mrs. Christine Gandon, the foreign
remittance of the bank introducing yourself  with your details, am sure
they will answer you back and give you further directives then we  proceed
from there but ensure you inform me and carry me along in every development.
I can't even explain why I have so much interest in your matter.
Regards for this goes to show that you are a very good person that just
needs help.
Therefore, you are advised to contact the CREDIT AGRICOLE NEXT BANK SA on
the below address.

Please find below the bank details:
BANK NAME:  CREDIT AGRICOLE NEXT BANK SA

ADDRESS; Esplanade de Pont-Rouge 8-1
                  71212 GRAND-LANCY
                   Suisse-Switzerland
Attention to: Mrs. Christine Gandon ,(Director Foreign Remittance).
E-mail: info@agricolenext.com
E-mail: transferdept@agricolenext.com

You are going to contact the bank with the following information
A. Your Full Name..............
B. Your Address................
C. Your Country..................
D. Your working phone Number..............
E. Your working Email............................
Talk to you later.

Yours faithfully.
Rev. James Morrison

subject: Re: Dear Christine
body:
Hello Rev. James Morrison,

Thank you for your message and for showing interest in my matter. I appreciate your guidance and advice.

To answer your personal questions, I am a private person and prefer not to share too much about myself online. However, I can tell you that I enjoy reading, gardening, and spending time with my family.

As per your instructions, I will contact the bank as soon as possible. However, could you please clarify what information they might need from me? You mentioned a few things like full name and working phone number but didn't specify all of them.

Also, could you explain more about the selection process? How are people chosen randomly? Is there any criteria or is it completely random?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Christine

subject: Re: Dear Christine
body:
Dear Christine
Thanks for your message but do not worry yourself about the method used
because we all know what a selection process is.
Go ahead and relate with the bank first for what we are doing might not
even be what the bank requires from you we are just guessing Okay.
Random is random, no other explanation that you don't know is called
selection and I am not with them and can not really say this is how it's
done. Let us now leave irrelevant and hold on to relevant.
Regards and let me know what the bank says to you after you have contacted
them.
Yours faithfully.
Rev. James Morrison

subject: Re: Dear Christine
body:
Hello Christine,

Thank you for your message. I appreciate your concern about the method used, but there's no need to worry. We all understand what a selection process is, right? 

I suggest you go ahead and communicate with the bank first. Our assumptions might not align with what the bank actually requires from you. After all, we're just making educated guesses here.

Remember, randomness is just that - random. No one else that you don't know can truly define how it's done. Let's focus on what's relevant and set aside the irrelevant for now.

Please do let me know what the bank says to you after you've contacted them.

Best regards,
Rev.

Best wishes,
Christine
